name: The 2023 11th International Conference on Language, Media and Culture
content: Publications: International Journal of Languages, Literature and Linguistics(IJLLL): As per the topics of the papers, some accepted papers will be recommended to be published in International Journal of Languages, Literature and Linguistics (IJLLL), which will be included in Google Scholar, Engineering & Technology Digital Library, Crossref, and Proquest. ISSN: 2382-6282 Frequency: Quarterly DOI: 10.18178/IJLLL Template: http://www.ijlll.org/IJLLL\_template.doc International Journal of Social Science and Humanity(IJSSH): As per the topics of the papers, some accepted papers will be recommended to be published in International Journal of Social Science and Humanity (IJSSH), which will be indexed by Google Scholar, Index Copernicus, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library. ISSN: 2010-3646 Frequency: Quarterly (Since 2019) DOI: 10.18178/IJSSH Template: http://www.ijssh.org/IJSSH\_template.doc
